title: Tennis elbow
creator_credit: John Thomson and Swinburne Institute of Technology. Film and Television School
brief_description: A tennis match provides the basis for a series of hilarious visual gags. A combination of absurd humour and satire is perpetrated by those graduates of the fringe comedy circuit, Kelso and Curtis and Los Trios Ringbarkus. Erwin Rado Award for Best Australian Short Fiction, Melbourne Film Festival 1983.
